Creates a button at position x, y, containing certain text

Reimplemented from CToggleButton.

int COnOffButton::setState ( int state )
 

Indicates the current state of the on/off button. If the button is off, this resource has a value of 0; if the button is on, this resource has a nonzero value.

int COnOffButton::getState ( )
 

Indicates the current state of the on/off button. If the button is off, this resource has a value of 0; if the button is on, this resource has a nonzero value.

void COnOffButton::addNewValueCallback ( PtCallbackF_t newValueCallbackFunction,
void * data = 0 )
 

amA list of callbacks that the widget invokes when the state of the
on/off button changes.
